title: What Can I Be?
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 49 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 100L
description: One little monster is trying to decide what to be for Halloween. A ghost? A carrot? A mummy? What Can I Be? is a playful and engaging book with colorful illustrations that support simple text. The book can also be used to practice identifying characters and retelling to remember and understand the text.
reviewWords: ghost, Halloween, mummy, pale, shiny, sweet
grammar: Pronouns : Identify and use the pronoun I
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words can and be
